helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get support for your Fincept account.

resetPassword.title: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login screen, enter your email, and follow the reset link we send you.

guestAccess.title: What is Guest Access?
guestAccess.answer: Guest access allows you to try the terminal without creating an account. Your session lasts 24 hours.

upgrade.title: How do I upgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: Go to Settings > Account to view and upgrade your subscription plan.

dataSync.title: Is my data synced?
dataSync.answer: Registered users have their data synced across devices. Guest users' data is stored locally.
